channel.title: repair on Ritual dust

item.title: Hammer handle
item.description: A while ago I found this little ball-peen hammer in an antique store, it had a handle at the time but it ended up breaking with use at the thinner part. The head sat in my tool chest for a couple years until recently when I started to work on my new tool chest project . With this new motivation to get all my tools together in a new home, I wanted to give this little guy a new handle.
